entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 08:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
